vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
παιδ-ευτής, οῦ, ὁ,
teacher, instructor, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 minister of education, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II corrector, chastiser, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
instructor, teacher; discipliner, corrector
a preceptor, instructor, teacher, primarily of boys; generally. Rom. 2:20; in NT a chastiser, discipliner, corrector Heb. 12:9*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: profesor, maestro ; persona que disciplina o corrige
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 指導者, 老師, 夫子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 指导者, 老师, 夫子
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: kẻ sửa dạy; người hướng dẫn.
